column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou's knocked it out of the park with their classic deep dish pizza. The crust was crisp and tasted great.  The sauce was light
column2: which let the rest of the pizza ingredients shine.   The sausage was really flavorful & the cheese was thick and stringy. And it wasn't "heavy"
column3: which is shows they really know how to provide a flavorful dish.
